video_prompt: A stylized woman, cool and self-assured, subtly shifts her expression as she prepares to ride. Her voluminous ponytail sways. Her metallic jacket shimmers, dynamically reflecting the vibrant red environment. The retro motorcycle's chrome gleams as its wheels begin to spin, headlight pulsing, and amber turn signals blinking. Dramatic shadows of the bike and rider subtly shift and stretch across the polished red surface, intensifying the reflections.
image_prompt: Dynamic, high-angle full shot of a stylized, confident young woman on a classic retro chrome cruiser motorcycle. She has a dark voluminous high ponytail, sharp features, winged eyeliner, and a cool expression. She wears an oversized, shiny silver metallic bomber jacket (reflecting red), black crop top, black shorts, and black Converse-style high-top sneakers. Accessories include layered silver necklaces, ear piercings, an intricate dark tattoo sleeve on her right arm, and a black fingerless glove. The motorcycle is highly polished chrome, reflecting the vibrant red, with an illuminated round headlight, black engine, chrome exhaust, and spoked wheels. The background is a vibrant, uniform solid red with subtle paneling. Dramatic lighting creates strong shadows, enhancing the modern, edgy aesthetic with high contrast. High-quality digital art, realistic yet stylized, anime-inspired.
refined_video_prompt: Her expression subtly shifts. Her ponytail sways. Her jacket shimmers, dynamically reflecting the red environment. The motorcycle's chrome gleams as its wheels spin, headlight pulses, and turn signals blink. Shadows of the bike and rider subtly shift and stretch, intensifying reflections.
